update.title: HacXploit 2010
update.body: Register for the ethical hacking workshop by Sunny Vaghela on the 19th and 20th of February 2010 HERE

update.title: 1000 Fans
update.body: Vivacity Facebook fan page has more than 1000 fans !!! Check it out !!!

update.title: Vivacity goes International
update.body: Vivacity will be host to international guest speakers and students from across the globe

update.title: PaintBall
update.body: Witness paintball for the first time in Jaipur at Vivacity 2010

update.title: Khoon Chala
update.body: Vivacity 2010 sends out the noble message of Blood Donation with a drive including donors from institutes and malls of Jaipur
